entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Winnipeg (The Forks)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winnipeg - The Forks 08:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
